<!-- source-hash: d9f71c8fc34d37f2076c63358a86b0d1 -->
A data transfer object representing an audit log event response with comprehensive event metadata and OpenAPI documentation annotations.

## Key Components

- **LogResponse** - Main DTO class with Lombok annotations for boilerplate code generation
- **toolEventId** - Unique identifier for the tool event
- **eventType** - Type of event (e.g., login, logout)
- **ingestDay** - Date of event ingestion in YYYY-MM-DD format
- **toolType** - Source tool that generated the event
- **severity** - Event severity level (INFO, WARN, ERROR, etc.)
- **userId/deviceId** - Associated user and device identifiers
- **summary** - Human-readable event description
- **timestamp** - Event occurrence time as Instant

## Usage Example

```java
// Creating a log response
LogResponse logResponse = LogResponse.builder()
    .toolEventId("evt_123456")
    .eventType("login")
    .ingestDay("2024-01-15")
    .toolType("meshcentral")
    .severity("INFO")
    .userId("user123")
    .deviceId("device456")
    .summary("User successfully logged in")
    .timestamp(Instant.now())
    .build();

// Accessing properties
String eventId = logResponse.getToolEventId();
Instant when = logResponse.getTimestamp();
```

The class is designed for REST API responses with Swagger/OpenAPI documentation support, making it ideal for audit trail endpoints.
